Ok, AOL is giving me emails in funny order and leaving some of them out, so 
if my post is a bit confusing or inacurate, please tell me.

::Shredder::

Shredder walks into Megatron's new base, looking around at the caves. He 
grunts, noting a slight lack of supplies while walking up to Megatron.

"No offence, but if Hell Beast or Zardus attack us here, we wouldn't stand 
much of a chance," he pauses to look at Quickstrike.

"Did you really promote him to sub-commander?" he asks Megatron before 
contunuing with what he was saying, "Anyways, there are alot more resources 
available. Scanner parts, weapons, fuel, scrap metal, and stuff like that. I 
can lead you to these resources."
